body_html: No, there's not, but it should be unnecessary. They should be stopped only once the main process receives and returns all batches. What arguments did you pass in to the DataLoader constructor (other than the dataset)?

body: No, there's not, but it should be unnecessary. They should be stopped only once the main process receives and returns all batches. What arguments did you pass in to the DataLoader constructor (other than the dataset)?
